website_summaries.verdict: Surpasses its competitors in almost every way – comfort, features, style, and versatility.
pros: Delivers more than others on our list with its versatility and features – glides, reclines, and swivels in an attractive model that fits most any decor
cons: The positioning of the glider feels a bit high to some consumers, but this doesn't affect its comfort

customer_reviews.title: Cannot recommend, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a year then disaster struck. The metal base has developed a fracture which has resulted in a loud, annoying squeak which wakes the baby up, rendering the purpose useless. I reached out to the company about receiving a replacement part and followed up but can't get a hold of anyone. do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Delco

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable chair for tall parents and their little babies
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a chair that my 6'2" husband could nap in with the baby. The market is saturated with gliders that aren't that dad friendly, but we all know that dads love cuddle time too. This one is great for a taller man or woman. It is comfortable, looks good, and most importantly soothes the baby. That and the fact that it swivels, glides, and reclines makes it worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Joyce

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair!!! Very soft and comfortable. It is amazing for the price! Highly recommend. It is pretty heavy in the box, so I recommend the husband to bring in the house. The recliner goes very far back which is lovely for those late night feedings we are having. The back is high enough for head support and I am 5'7".
customer_reviews.author: Kaylene Santiago

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed! Broke within 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed by this chair. In fairness, it looks fantastic-but after 3 months of normal use, it's completely broken. From the get-go it had a pretty annoying squeaky noise when rocking, but now it also tilts to the right and makes horrible noises. Also, it's way too tall (I'm 5'5'') for me, so it's been used mostly by my husband. All the negative reviews are accurate-don't buy this rocker!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ball

customer_reviews.title: Side bolsters are very weak... frame on the sides is made out or poor quality wood and stapled together.  Looking to return it
customer_reviews.text: When reclined it is quite deep. To return back to normal position and having baby on your lap you would have to push on the bolsters. Bolster broke... if you looking to buy one, beware, it doesn’t have a strong frame underneath the upholstery. If you have one try not to push on the bolsters, ours broke when I was trying to return back to sitting position.. no return option on this product.. Will try to contact amazon and see if we can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Zadorina

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best chairs for the money I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best chairs for the money I have ever had. They are comfortable and very elegant looking. I bought 2 for my living room which is quite formal and they fit in great. The fabric is beautiful, they are comfortable...and swivel and rock. I bought 2 of them and they are above my expectations. I have 2 lazy boy recliners in my den/office and I like these so much better. Packaged well easy to assemble put HEAVY so put them where you want as you won't be moving them often.
customer_reviews.author: Betty H

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, but broke down after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable, but started making loud creaking noises recently which can be heard throughout the house. If you are on the shorter side (I'm 5'3"), you might need some pillows for your back or an ottoman/stool to be able to rock/have feet touch the ground. I really liked the swivel option and the chair is very comfortable. I have spent hours rocking/feeding my baby and have even fallen asleep on it a few times and no back pain or strain of any kind. After about 6 months of use, it started making creaking noises and it just got worse day by day and has become unusable now.
customer_reviews.author: PuppyMom

customer_reviews.title: 2+ Years of Use and Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: 2+ YEARS LATER: I always look for reviews that are more than "I just got this morning and it feels great!" Or "shipped on time... 5 stars". Well we've had this recliner through our last two kids and it has held up perfectly. The cushioning is still firm and comfortable to sit in, it still looks great (we're lucky our kids have NOT given us reason to have to test its clean-ability!), and it's perfect for nursing and swaddling babies. I have sat in it (my husband too) for hundreds and hundreds of hours (and fallen asleep on occasion) and it is just great. For the price, it can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Decent rocker, ok recliner
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this chair in our daughter’s room for 2.5 years. It’s comfortable enough to sit in for bedtime stories or to rock her when she’s sick. I rarely use the chair in the reclining position, but it is quite difficult to put the leg rest down when you need to. I’m now moving it into the new baby’s nursery for feedings, etc. This chair is fine for rocking and feeding babies. I would not recommend this as a recliner for heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: JoDB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was really really fast ! Easy to put together. And pretty comfortable. However there are a few dirty ( Metal rust) spots and small scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce and Michele

customer_reviews.title: Upset.
customer_reviews.text: When this swivel arrives I was so exited. It’s works perfect for the propose. Was most comfy chair ever. And with my baby in my arms I was even used to sleep on it. After a month of use I sit on it with my baby in my arms. It’s just fell almost to the floor. I had to call my boyfriend to help me to wake. All of that with my baby in my arms. I think that they must be most responsable at the time of making this kind of products, in special because they are design to use with a baby. I will send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Eliana Gutiérrez

customer_reviews.title: Get this chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is amazing! The color is perfect, I would describe it as an icy taupe, the fabric is soft and easy to clean, and the padding is just the right amount of balance in between soft and firm. I used this at the end of my 3rd pregnancy, and it was so comfy. Its my nursing chair now that baby has arrived. I'm 5' 8", and find it tall enough for me. I was worried the square arms would be stiff and uncomfortable, but that is not the case, just the opposite. Everyone in my family loves this chair, and we are talking about getting a second one at some point
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Alene Barney

customer_reviews.title: not for shorter people but GREAT chair. this chair is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! not for shorter people but GREAT chair. this chair is beautiful, easy to assemble, no needing any screws-just click two pieces together. it's VERY comfortable and really moves well. my husband loves it. my husband is 6'0 and i'm 5'4 unfortunately it's a little too big for me. I need a pillow behind me to rock in it but it works otherwise. without a pillow I can still touch the floor and rock but on tippie toes. We're keeping it anyways bc it is perfect for husband and may use it downstairs and get a new chair for something else.
customer_reviews.author: kasha

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are uneven
customer_reviews.text: One of the four buttons on the back cushion is noticeably out of line, which makes the chair look silly and cheap. It is ridiculous that the seller would send us a chair with such an obvious flaw. Otherwise, the chair functions well - it reclines almost flat. It is comfortable. The cushions are comfortable, and the rock and swivel are nice. My only complaint regarding the comfort is that my feet do not touch the floor, and I am 5'5.
customer_reviews.author: Somer

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable but a great looking chair
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this chair in my daughter's nursery for a year but the armrests are not durable and are already dented. I rested my arms while I was nursing my daughter. It looks like the inside is made out of thick cardboard instead of wood. At least, what it seems to me on the armrests. Otherwise, it's a modern and good looking chair.
customer_reviews.author: Christine W.

customer_reviews.title: Mocha color is gray
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied with my purchase. Just kind of surprised why they call it mocha color because this is a gray color 100%. Don’t get me wrong it’s pretty but if you really want to have a mocha recliner this is not the one. The box that this arrived with was huge and very heavy, so be home when this arrives. I’m 5’4.5” and my feet can reach the floor pretty good. Easy to recliner. Swivel function is not smooth. Reclins pretty good. Beautiful recliner overall.
customer_reviews.author: H.M

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: I started using this chair in February 2017. It is very comfortable, a great nursery rocker, and easy to assemble. Unfortunately it's been making a clicking noise the last few weeks so i had my husband look at it, he discovered many bolts had become lose and a few actually fell out. Thankfully, they were easy to put back and fix. For a nearly $300 chair i expect more but its fixed now so I'm happy
customer_reviews.author: Michaela

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable and beautiful for the price but we were extremely disappointed with how it was packaged. The box was torn up and filthy so we were worried about the state we would find the chair in. Luckily, the chair wasn't dirty but it did look like their were faint scratch marks along the foot reclining area and along one of the sides. I'm not sure if those are common for the material but it seemed like it wasn't a brand new chair. We decided to keep it just because we were so close to our due date. Otherwise very pleased with the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this recliner ! We just put it together today. It only took about 10 minutes to unwrap and assemble. It only came in two pieces . The base was extremely heavy. My husband is 5"10 215lbs and fits comfortably in it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: gina giavotella

customer_reviews.title: Best Recliner
customer_reviews.text: I have now owned this recliner for over 5+ months with daily use. This is by far the most comfortable recliner I have owned I love the swivel and the fact that it doesn't take up that much room. It lays back almost flat and the cushions are a good balance between firm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Disneychanga

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It glides, swivels 360, and it reclines. The material is velvety soft. I ordered it in the neutral color mocha and love it. Some reviewers said it's difficult to push the recliner foot part back down, but found it easier to push back down by placing back of ankle at very bottom of footing where your feet would hang off and then use back of ankle to push down instead of using heal on recliner to push back.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable, durable, kind of heavy to move it
customer_reviews.text: We agonized over which rocker/recliner to get. I’m so glad we got this one. It was not very expensive, but it is so so comfortable. I’m glad we didn’t spend a bunch of money on it because I don’t feel that bad about it when it gets spitup on it or I spill or whatever. The fabric is easy to clean if you wipe it up right away. We have each slept many hours in this chair and it is comfortable for us both. (5’7” and 6’0”). The arm rests are at a perfect height for me for using a boppy nursing pillow. The arm rests help to support the pillow so it doesn’t sag.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Manufacture defect
customer_reviews.text: I contacted the seller since one of the metal pieces on the bottom of the chair broke into pieces. After seeing reviews with people having the same problem I thought I would contact the seller to give them a chance to fix it. After sending them pictures and explaining to them the situation they still They still want to charge me for the part since it's not under warranty. That's not good customer service since it is a manufacture defect. I will not use them again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot say enough about this chair
customer_reviews.text: It’s so comfortable. It has all the features I wanted in a nursery chair. It’s soft. It’s a just a smidge too high for me for the rocker but I make do. I’m 5”4. It rocks, it swivels, it reclines, it’s comfy. This might be the easiest thing I’ve ever had to assemble. It comes in 2 pieces. The only thing I would ask the makers is to offer it in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7”. This chair is literally the most uncomfortable chair. The arms are too low, making it hard for a boppy pillow to stay in place while nursing. The square edges are uncomfortable for baby’s legs as they get bigger. My rocker developed an awful squeak when it rocks totally defeating the purpose. The top of the chair is slanted so when you put you head back it’s super uncomfortable. For spending so much time in this chair over the last two months I wish i would have just got a lazyboy. New moms - you will spend a lot of time in your rocker. Do not buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Foust

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Very soft fabric. Smooth gliding.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in the nursery. Not too big or too small. I love smooth gliding. It is comfortable and the armrests are the right height for me. I'm 5 '6". I will say when I first sit down I have to push myself back a little more for my back to firmly be against the back of the chair. It does make a few little noises when rocking but other than those things was a great purchase. Love the soft fabric. Looks great in my baby's room.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: we like it. We ordered the brown
customer_reviews.text: So far, we like it. We ordered the brown, but it definitely looks more grey, which is the one we wanted anyway. The back didn't click down on one side, so we are going to have to work on that. I'm 5'7" with long legs and sitting all the way back, my feet don't reach, which is not normal, but it's not a bad thing. The foot rest went up and down pretty easy. Can't wait to get some use out of it when baby arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is such an amazing chair. I thought from the picture that it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing chair. I thought from the picture that it would not be comfortable but it is soooo comfortable. The only reason I've slept at all since the birth of my son has been because of this chair. We are moving from our apartment to a two story house and we purchased a second one. One for upstairs and one for downstairs. Seriously, leave the furniture store behind and buy this chair! It's super heavy though and kind of difficult to get through the door but once you do it's easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Tzeitel Bartholomew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing functionality!
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I could give it 4 1/2 stars. The chair is indeed very comfortable and was insanely easy to put together. The cloth material will always make it a bit challenging going to clean since you can’t simply wipe it down, but that is to be expected from anything that is cloth. My wife loves the chair, especially the gliding one moment and reclining the next functionality. For me, it works but being taller (6’2”) I wish the chair was slightly longer when reclining, but that is simply nitpicking.
customer_reviews.author: G.Felix

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable chair that holds up!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this chair for 3 years I am actually writing this review because I just recommended it a friend. We used this in our nursery for two babies lots of snuggles, feeding, and sleeping in this chair! Both my husband and I agree this is the most comfortable pice of furniture we own. 3 years later it is now in our living room and still looks new! Highly recommend this chair for your home.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: This chair is not only nice looking but extremely comfortable and reasonably priced (this was ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair in December 2016 and wanted to wait a bit to review after I'd had the chance to use it. I purchased it because I was expecting a baby and wanted a comfy rocking chair with the ability to recline. I spent multiple hours researching these types of chairs in baby stores and online. This chair is not only nice looking but extremely comfortable and reasonably priced (this was key for me). Only negative is, as previous reviews have mentioned, the chair arms are not very wide but it's easy to adjust to that with a pillow or stuffed animal. I HIGHLY recommend this chair and am so happy I found it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin M.

customer_reviews.title: Chair Arrived With Stains
customer_reviews.text: My wife was really excited to get this chair. She had read all of the reviews and was really confident this was the chair she wanted for our nursery. The chair arrived quickly and was easy to assemble. However, as we pulled off the plastic wrapping, we noticed several stains (appeared to be grease stains) and various other stains on the chair. VERY DISAPPOINTED! Our baby is set to arrive within the week and there is no time to get a replacement chair. This is a $350 chair and one would expect it to arrive perfect and without stains!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mccallie

customer_reviews.title: ) I love it and it is very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I saw some reviews that the chair is hard to close for women. I am 5'2" and while my feet do not touch if I sit all the way back I can still rock and swivel the chair perfectly. I can also close the recliner without a struggle. (trust me my couch is difficult to close.) I love it and it is very comfy. It is perfect for the last 8 weeks with our newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Posting for your help

customer_reviews.title: Worth the risk!
customer_reviews.text: I was super hesitant about buying a chair online having not sat in it, but this is an awesome chair. The arm rests are about an inch too low for me to be perfectly comfortable while holding the baby, but a pillow under my elbow takes away that problem. This was very easy to install. It comes in two pieces--the backrest and the seat--and both pieces are pretty heavy, so be prepared. We put the chair together in the baby's room where it will stay just to avoid having to drag it through the doorway. I highly recommend this. We have both spent many evenings rocking or reclining with the baby in this very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the nursery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter after looking for the right rocker/recliner for months. It came well packaged and was easy to put together as only 2 pieces. My daughter loves how it looks and she says it is very comfortable. The material is rich looking and we were both pleasantly surprised. It appears sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not functional.
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically, it looks great. Functionally, as a nursery chair, not so much. The arm rests are too low for support. The foot rest is difficult to push down and makes a loud clicking sound when it latches.
customer_reviews.author: Just another person

customer_reviews.title: Best value money can buy
customer_reviews.text: Got this chair as a nursery chair for my expecting wife but even before our kid arrives this has now become her favorite go to chair to sit on. It is very comfortable and is classy looking and is very well worth the money. I would extremely recommend this chair for anyone that is looking for a cheap quality chair for their home. Well worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Sapawa

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to assemble! The fabric is very soft and super comfy seat. The only thing I would agree with the other reviews is that it does take some strength to get the recline to come up and down. And it would be awesome if it glided when reclined, which it doesn't. Overall, we are excited to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamin Wunderink

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great chair!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great! It was pretty simple to put together and it is very comfortable. My baby is a bit older, so it's not getting use out of like he might have the first year of his life, but still glad I got it. He finally has his own room now. I could actually sleep on this chair all night if I needed to - it's that comfy! It does squeak a little bit half the time I'm rocking in it, but it's not super loud and not a huge deal breaker to me. The comfort is really important to me and it looks great in the room as well. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Koogler

customer_reviews.title: Chair broke apart within a year.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking chair, semi-comfortable compared to lazboy. Gliding feature is the best part of this chair. Quality of the chair is so-so. I had the bolts rip out of the bracket that attaches the back support. Good thing I had a wall behind me to catch me and the baby. I cannot recommend this chair based on it breaking on us.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Not Safe due to difficult foot rest if you have a baby
customer_reviews.text: While this chair is comfortable, you cannot push the foot rest down - especially if you're holding a baby. In fact if you are by yourself and are holding a baby it is quite dangerous because you can't get out of the chair. I nearly fell holding my newborn trying to get out of the chair because I couldn't push the foot rest down. This chair would be perfect if it had a lever to get the foot rest down.
customer_reviews.author: LondonChels

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this recliner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this recliner six months ago for our baby room. I didn’t use for the first 45 days as we awaited our baby. In the first week of use the arm broke off. I contacted the seller that said we were out of the 30 day return window and to contact the manufacturer instead in China. Instead I fixed the arm with screws, glue and reinforcements. Two weeks later the other arm broke off so I fixed it. It frustrated me but I still used it because I spent $250 on it. Then at 3 months the mechanical parts started breaking down and the chair stays in the recline position. Save your money. Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Apparently don’t expect perfect condition upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair because of all the positive reviews and I liked the way it looked. The first chair that was delivered had deep set scratches on the arms that would not come out. If I’m paying full price for something, I do expect it to be in perfect condition on day 1 before use. So, I sent it back for replacement.... and now the replacement chair that was delivered has deep set scratches on the seat of the chair. Not sure if I have bad luck or if this happened to others as wel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just do it!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth on purchasing this rocker-it was pretty pricey but I couldn't find a nicer one in the same price range. So glad I purchased. Very comfy and the linen version looks great. I'm 5'5'' and have trouble touching the floor when I sit all the way back but add a footstool or a puff and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: The color and fabric looks great. It is really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our nursery. The color and fabric looks great. It is really comfortable, and easy to recline. The foot rest was kind of hard to kick back in place after giving birth, but a month later, it is a little easier to do (still, I wouldn't say it's easy to kick back). Perfect for the nursery & night feedings! I often fall asleep after feeding my son, and it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Elbeyli

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Wife and I have been sleeping in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Wife and I have been sleeping in the chair a lot. She's 5'4" and her feet don't easily touch the ground when sitting but it hasn't been a big deal. Packaging arrived half destroyed and looking terrible but the chair was in fine shape. Hopefully the chair holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: DALW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair for a perfectionist mom and dad
customer_reviews.text: Ohhh this chair...I took my time reading every review about this chair and other chairs. I spent about 2 months looking for a chair was comfortable, gray, modern, recliner & glider and reasonably priced. PEOPLE this was it. when I sat on it for the first time, I could not believe that a chair from an online order had satisfied my needs. The only downside is that the when the chair is reclined, the foot rest is hard to put back in; definitely not doable while holding a baby but that goes with every manual recliner/glider unless they are automatic/electronic. I am so happy with this chair, everything about it met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Shadi Golshani

customer_reviews.title: Reclines all the way! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this glider/recliner. It is so comfortable, yet has a smaller footprint than a lot of the chairs we were looking at for our nursery. We have a rather small room so this was key. I love the recliner. It reclines all the way back and I've spent a few nights sleeping in it very comfortably. There was a lot of resistance to get the footrest to go back in at first, but now I have no problem. I may be a bit weak though because my husband didn't have any issue at all... I can't recommend this chair enough!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique

customer_reviews.title: Rock-A-Bye-Baby
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes this chair is incredible! It is worth every penny! My grandson can't keep his eyes open the minute we start rocking. The glider and foot extension are an added bonus! It is comfortable, durable, soft, and very easy to glide. It won't hurt your walls either. It is very attractive and modern. This was worth the money and I would highly recommend it~especially if you plan to rock a little one in it!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Helman

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken but they fixed the issue
customer_reviews.text: The arm rest was crushed but the box appeared ok. Update: the manufacturer replaced the bottom within 5 days of claim. The chair sits really tall, I am 5’2” and cannot reach the floor to rock. The back height is alright. I don’t think it would be comfortable for anyone taller than me. I wish the arm rests were a little taller. I still think I will be happy with the chair very supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this chair
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. Fabric is soft, seat is spacious, it rotates and I can lift my legs. The only thing I would improve would be the way the leg rest comes up and the strenght it needs (and noise this causes) when you are ready to leave the chair. When you have a baby and she finaly fell asleep the least thing you want is to make noise.
customer_reviews.author: Ale

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, quality a bit lacking.
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to assemble, but the quality is pretty poor. The metal frame arrived with rust on it already, where it looks like it'd never been painted or had already rubbed off. Not the mention there was a black oil smudge on the fabric, that we just can't get out. It is really heavy though, which is nice, we don't worry about it tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: William P. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: SQUEAKS
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE chair - squeaks like crazy and the recline is not easy to put in so when baby’s sleeping and you had your feet up, good luck “clicking” it back in easily to get up without waking baby... so I stopped using the recline completely but the squeaking has been since day 1 and no amount of wd40works its the construction of the chair - crap. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: A must buy, worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3.5 years ago, as my babyshower gift😱 just now getting around to writing a review. This recliner has been used by everyone in my family. Its sturdy, easy to clean and very comfortable. A must buy if you are looking for a rocking chair/recliner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the chair and the comfort but the white buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the chair and the comfort but the white buttons were not sewn in properly and all are loose. Unfortunately returning this item is not an option as it is hard to ship out because its so bulky. How do you deal with this? Can amazon pay for someone to come and sew them in correctly. If the buttons fall off, which they seem like they will cause they are so loose, then the chair looses its full look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable chair around!
customer_reviews.text: Have never sat on any chair that's more comfortable than this... Starting from the putting together, chair took less than 2 minutes to put together, literally. It came in 2 pieces, the back and chair and simply had to be snapped into place. Since then I am addicted to this chair. Have it for a few weeks already and quality seems great and nothing can beat this chair when it comes to comfortability. In sitting or in reclining position, I kind of feel like I'm gliding in the most comfy place around. Awesome chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven R

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for baby's room!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this chair! It was so easy to put together (literally two pieces that slide together). And it is so comfortable. Both the reclined and the upright, rocking positions are amazing. The chair is firm without being stiff and I feel like it is going to last us a long time through multiple babies. Make sure you look at the dimensions - I wasn't prepared for how big it was because of the lower price on it! It fits perfectly in our baby's little room, it's just a little bigger than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great glider!
customer_reviews.text: OMG so comfortable! I bought a cheap glider at first, but the color didnt look good in my nursery, also once i took it out of box the smell was so overwhelming, smelled like fresh paint and made the whole room smell like that for couple of days. Got rid of it and decided to pay a little more but be comfortable, not worry about chemical smell of the fabric and have the color that goes with everything. So glad i got it, super comfy, great material (will be easy to clean).
customer_reviews.author: YW

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for fidgeting people
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable until it comes to the arm rests and the buttons on the back of the chair. I fidget when I sit for an extended amount of time and there is little to no padding on the arms. Also it I twist at all while in the chair the buttons come out of the fabric and dig into my back. They are easily pushed back in but it’s frustrating they come out in the first place. Because of these features I probably would have gotten a different one for the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Webb

customer_reviews.title: Love this rocker!
customer_reviews.text: Love this rocker! My only complaint was the box was a little beat up and was scared the rocker was broken but everything works. We have this in our 18 month old’s room and expecting in August. Fits well in her small bedroom with a crib, changing table, and book case. Very comfy but a little hard to get out of if you’re short and pregnant. The leg rest is a little hard to push down. Arm rests are lower than I expected but still comfortable for rocking and nursing a baby. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected! Granted, we just got it today, but it was fast to assemble (though incredibly heavy). Neither the UPS delivery man nor my husband could get it up our front steps & we had to open the box outside). I saw some photos of what looked like a striated fabric, but ours came as it said-grey microfiber. It rocks, it swivels, it reclines & im 5'8" & can rest my head in the top of the chair. Totally sleep- able I think :)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: I took a chance and I am glad I did - I really love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to get a chair for the nursery off Amazon without sitting in it. I took a chance and I am glad I did - I really love this chair. I am 6ft tall and find it to be very comfortable, and I like the material. Reclines easy - a little bit more difficult to close, but not anything that you'd consider a struggle. It was very easy to put together, too. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Nowell

customer_reviews.title: Nice for nursery
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect chair for our nursery! I love that it is both a recliner and a rocker. My one complaint is that the leg-rest is hard to get backdown. I really have to push hard, which is difficult to do with a sleeping baby. If you found this review to be helpful please click "Helpful." Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb E.

customer_reviews.title: Bulky but great rocker recliner for baby room
customer_reviews.text: It's true that it is perfect for someone taller than 5'. 4 star for that reason. Won't rock when it's reclined but I don't mind. Swivels when reclined though. I put a step stool in front of me when rocking or breastfeeding my baby and he falls asleep within minutes which is perfect for me at night. Overall I feel like I'll be using this for a while! Great decor for my room and fabric is great as well! Pretty comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: vmarie

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this glider/recliner. Comfortable & the back/neck support is high enough for both myself & my husband to be comfortable for lengthy periods of time if needed. Reclines easy, I saw other reviews saying putting the foot rest back into the slot was kind of hard, ours does not have that problem at all and it’s easy to use . Overall I enjoy this and the price is fair for what you receive
customer_reviews.author: Kiesha 💓

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but it's impossible to put recliner back into upright position.
customer_reviews.text: If you are using this chair for light use, and you have super strong legs I would recommend, otherwise I would pass. It is a beautiful chair and very comfortable to sit in, but it's very hard to get out of the reclining position. Also after one month's use, the back keeps separating from the bottom leaving a substantial gap.
customer_reviews.author: Educator/Student

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as reviews suggested
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as reviews suggested. Maybe it needs to break in but seat cushion is hard and the mechanics are a little rough and have to be forced closed as it doesn't close back up easily. Would send it back but destroyed the box as it was trash day while we were assembling it . Updated review Cushions broke in so it's a little more comfortable to sit on now. I moved it over into the nursery and it fits perfectly and is ideal for the space I had
customer_reviews.author: Shazza

customer_reviews.title: Does not assemble correctly.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is great, but like other reviewers, have noted, the quality control is not good- ours has 1' gaps where the wing should meet the arm rest. I won't be returning it because it's a huge assembled chair. If you are OCD about these things, you might consider a different chair.
customer_reviews.author: Sharbearnana

customer_reviews.title: Safety hazard
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write poor reviews for products but I thought this one required a public safety announcement. My chairs base broke within 2 years of buying it causing a serious injury to me (with my baby in hand)..their customer service neither responds not cares about these issues which is shocking to me considering that this is not a cheap product. I would not recommend buying this chair.
customer_reviews.author: mahak sharma

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I had in my nursery!!!! When I got out of the hospital I could not sit anywhere but on this chair (after giving birth I got five stitches). Best money spent! I spent 2 weeks from bed to that chair I would even have dinner on that chair because it was the only place I felt comfortable sitting it. I did need help if I reclined it because it is a little stiff but still worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: comfy for solo sleep, breastfeed... pillow
customer_reviews.text: our initial order was broken, wouldnt recline using lever. the return was aaaamazing so effortless, thank u for that! our replacement is in working order. the only thing i see may be a problem is the arm rests are so low. may be a pain to breastfeed being that you dont really have support. you may need a pillow. i was trying it out and fell asleep in it for 3 hours!! i reclined it all the way, its verrry comfy to sleep in solo :) would be great to sleep in babys room when they're sick or having a rough night.
customer_reviews.author: bianca

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this chair for our nursery in May 2017 and loved it so much that we got the exact same one for our new baby's nursery in July 2018. I have spent many nights sleeping (both sitting up and reclining all the way back) in this chair and it is super comfortable. I threw my back out a couple of times over the past year and am in less pain sitting in this chair than I am in any other chair in the house. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: NOISY CHAIR
customer_reviews.text: This chair has been in my son's room for about two years now. The chair was fine at first, but after about a year of using it lightly on a daily basis, it started to squeak horribly. There's no way to position myself so that this chair doesn't make some kind of irritating, monotonous sound. I'm not a large person either and my son is just two yrs old. Luckily, the squeaking doesn't bother my child, it drives me mad though and it's going out on the curb soon. This chair isn't worth the money. Furniture, good furniture, should last some time, especially with gentle use. I do not recommend purchasing this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this glider/recliner
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this glider/recliner. It is super comfortable for those postpartum aches and pains. I love the fact that it sits straight up when I'm breastfeeding, it is the perfect back support for that, but then I can lay back and recline if I want to as well. I would buy this chair 100 times over. Totally worth it and also pleasing to the eye. It is currently parked in my living room and I don't ever sit anywhere else
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Corona

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, but beware it can easily tip over!
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very nice and easy to assemble. The reclining feature does have some issues. As many people have stated it is hard to close the foot rest when returning from the reclining position. What we found to be a bigger problem is that the chair will actually tip over backwards when it is fully reclined. We found this to be a big concern especially if you are reclined with your new born baby! If you aren't careful and lean backwards to much it literally just falls over. Other than that, it is a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay T

customer_reviews.title: Great Nursery Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was Leary or making a large furniture purchase without trying it first but I could not be happier with this chair. I slept in it the last 2 minthsbof my pregnancy and loved how wide and comfortable it was, as well as how much it reclined. Now that we have our baby, who is now 3 weeks old, we use it for nursing and more sleeping-it’s big enough for my husband or myself. The only ‘down fall’ and this is very minor, is the depth of the chair. I’m 5’5 and rock it with my tip toes...a small pillow at the back that boosts you forward does the trick-other wise i’d Highly recommend for a nursery.
customer_reviews.author: APRIL

customer_reviews.title: Tall, compact swivel glider great for baby and mama!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this chair! We currently have it in our living room until baby gets bigger and moves into her nursery. Our living room space is small, and the chair fits perfectly! The chair swivels and glides nicely. A few things to know: -the chair does not move when reclined; -I am 5'9" and my feet barely touch the ground. My husband is 6'1" and is perfect for him. So, it might be too tall for people on the shorter side.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie B

customer_reviews.title: Great nursing chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. It’s very comfy and made nursing a lot easier. My only complaint is that the recliner is hard to push back in with your legs. You have to do it fast and with force, so it is pretty loud. I just leave it out when moving sleeping baby, which can be difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, very comfortable, and looks nice in the house. I do wish I hadn't gone for a slightly more traditional recliner at this one isn't as roomie as I would like and the arms do not come up high enough for me. However it does the job exactly as it says it would and looks exactly like the picture says, so I can't complain that I didn't order something bigger. I was trying to save money and I got exactly what I paid for, which is not a bad thing. My baby and I spend most of our day in this chair. It is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: v

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfy this chair is. I bought it after reading reviews about husbands lovomg it. My husband is 6’4 and most gliders are small. I read other husbands over 6’ loved it so I Bought it. Glad I did! My husband loves rocking our son in it and I am comfy too! My only complaint is the recliner is hard for me to push back in and it’s not quiet when you do. But I would still buy it over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Harris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a breastfeeding chair in my son's nursery instead of a standard rocker, and I am glad I splurged. It's great to be able to put up my feet when I want to. And, when you don't need a footrest the chair takes up less room than a glider.
customer_reviews.author: JLWelch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing recline
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had purchased this from the beginning! Quiet rocking, almost full recline, comfy and stylish. My only complaint is that the arms aren’t as wide or padded as they could be. The footrest is difficult to put down so if you have a c-section you should buy a poof or other cheap footrest until you’re able to really push down.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Mak

customer_reviews.title: It needs a little force at the end but it's super worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about putting in the footrest but i really don't have any problems with it. It needs a little force at the end but it's super worth it for the price. Super comfortable and perfect for baby :) I'm 5'9" and my husband is 6'3" and we both enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Macey

customer_reviews.title: The chair is very comfortable, and love the recliner
customer_reviews.text: The chair is very comfortable, and love the recliner. My husband surprised me and put it together while I was at work, but other than being heavy, he had no issues with it. Unlike other buyers have posted, I don't have any problems with putting the footrest down and I am only 5'4. I would recommend this chair for your nursery, it is definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, useful but hard to close
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with my purchase. So far it has worked great for us. The arms are obviously not comfortable so I use a pillow when holding baby. It is comfortable and rocks easily but it is very difficult to close when reclined, especially if you are short. I don’t recline it if I have the baby asleep and plan on getting up because it will wake him immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lis C.

customer_reviews.title: This not only looked terrible, but it also made the chair feel unstable
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this chair since it would go perfectly in our nursery. Unfortunately, we experienced the same issue as other reviewers, the side wings of the backrest were not flush with the armrests, leaving about a 3 inch gap between the two. This not only looked terrible, but it also made the chair feel unstable. It was definitely due to a manufacturing defect, as there was zero possibility the backrest could go any lower so the two pieces would meet. Unfortunately, we had to return the chair.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks like no other!
customer_reviews.text: This chair worked great at the very beginning. Got it for our newborn to rock to sleep. But very quickly it would start to squeak. We would take the back off and put it back on and that helped for a tiny bit. Now there is nothing we can do to stop it from making a horrible Boise everytime you move in it. It wakes my baby up while trying to put her to sleep. And it is incredibly hard to put it back to sitting position from reclining position. I feel like I have to use ALL my strength possible. Frustrated because I enjoy this chair if it actually worked correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Useful for dads too
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the wife, thinking it be easier to get the baby to sleep. But what ended up happening is both of my lovely ladies taking up the whole bed and me sleeping in this recliner. Good news is this thing his freaking comfortable. It reclines back and I put on an eye mask and noise canceling headphones. Good luck trying to wake me up. Lol. So dads buy this this it may save your life.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Tips backwards very easily!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. My husband said it tipped over when he was in it and it did not take much. I had not experienced it until a minute ago. Me, my 3mos old and my 3yo were on the chair in an upright position rocking and then all of a sudden it tipped backwards!! Mind you all together we weigh a combined 180lbs. Fortunately the fall impact was buffered by the baby's rock and play behind it but still! What a fright especially with me and my infant. This is getting trashed
customer_reviews.author: ARod Davis

customer_reviews.title: I have had this chair for only 5 months and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for only 5 months and the whole metal part on the left side where the back of the chair goes in ripped apart. It's going to the dump now
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair! Searched high and wide for months
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair! Searched high and wide for months, finally ordered this one and my husband and I are thrilled! I am 5'9" and my husband is 6'1" (205 lbs)- both of us sit very comfortably with plenty of leg, hip and head space to relax! Husband sleeps in this chair while it's reclined with ease!! VERY COMFY and plush with sturdy arm rests for feedings! Definite must!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren C.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend, with a stool
customer_reviews.text: Great product, particularly for the price. Smooth rock, swivels effortlessly. I'm 5'6" and need a small foot stool (3" high) to help rock, the chair sits rather high. Great addition to our nursery.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveReader

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product at first. But after two years of use, it’s falling apart. The foot stand has always been difficult to put down but now it’s impossible. You would be unable to do it without waking a sleeping baby. The chair is wobbly and feels unstable. Plus, it has terrible lumbar support...which I didn’t realize the first year. I wish I got a better quality chair for our nursery since you spend so many hours in it. This would have been the place to splurge!
customer_reviews.author: Na123

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype.. it's not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This chair is not only very uncomfortable it is extremely hard to close the leg rest. It makes getting out of the chair with a baby in hand almost impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L.

customer_reviews.title: We're so happy with our purchase
customer_reviews.text: We're so happy with our purchase! I was a little weary of purchasing furniture online without trying it out in person, but this chair is amazing! It is SO comfortable, beautiful color, and looks great in the nursery. We have a newborn, and it is very easy to clean up when she spits up on it. It doesn't seem to stain! Very worth the money. It's quite heavy if you have to carry it up any stairs, but it does come in 2 pieces so you can carry each part separately. Would definitely recommend this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not anything like I hoped it would be
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be the perfect chair. It is a beautiful chair. Ours starting falling apart when my baby was about 3 months old. I was never able to make the recline part go down. Which was extremely difficult. Then everything started squeaking and creaking. Then all of a sudden about 9 months in the swivel piece that is made of metal literally broke and the chair was then rendered unusable. So ours was definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: adelia

customer_reviews.title: Average height person's feet won't touch ground.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'5 and my feet do not touch the ground. Neither does my 5'8 husband's. So that makes it uncomfortable for long periods of time like nursing unless you recline. Fabric is a tad rough too. I like that it rocks, swivels, reclines, and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Not For Long Term Use
customer_reviews.text: This glider worked well, besides the footrest that’s very hard to put down, for the first year but now it’s junk, wood is cracked. I have a feeling it was received damaged and after using for a year the damaged evident. If you are looking for a long term solution I would not recommend at all.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Super Uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for 14 weeks now ans both my husband and I hate it. It is SO UNCOMFORTABLE! Our backs kill us after rocking. It also is already super squeaky in the back. Don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: but we couldn’t be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We were hesitant to buy a chair online before sitting in it, but we couldn’t be happier with this purchase! This chair is very comfortable! We are using in our baby’s nursery. It is perfect for nursing. We love that it swivels, rocks and reclines. The color was just as expected, and it was very easy to put together. This is an excellent chair for the price! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: abbie

product_meta.title: Baby Relax Mikayla Swivel Glider Recliner Chair, Gray Linen
product_meta.description: Color:Gray LinenDesigned with your needs in mind, the Baby Relax Mikayla Swivel Glider Recliner features provides comfort that will make you never want to leave your child's room again. The enclosed ball bearing mechanism allows for both a rotating swivel function and a smooth gliding motion; giving you a full range of movement for optimal functionality. For even more added comfort, the Mikayla includes a built-in easy-pull mechanism that is within easy reach to prop up your legs on the leg rest or to fully recline the unit. Offered in a wide variety of options, choose amongst a number of colors to suit your taste and décor aesthetic. With beautiful touches such as the contrasting white welt detailing, the soft button tufted upholstery, and the supportive spring core foam filled seat, the Baby Relax Mikayla Swivel Glider Recliner will be a great addition to your nursery room or living room décor.
feature_bullets: Square silhouette with pocket coil seating, track arm design, button tufted backrest upholstery and elegant welt trim detailing.
Enclosed ball bearing mechanism for both a rotating swivel function & smooth gliding motion.
Sturdy construction with supportive spring core foam filled seat.
Minimal assembly required. Available in a number of color and fabric options. 1-year limited warranty.
Product dimensions: 30"L x 37"W x 41.75"H. Seat dimensions: 22"W x 21"D x 21.5"H. Weight limit: 225 lbs. Net weight: 89.1 lbs. Shipping dimensions: 32"L x 30"W x 32"H. Gross weight: 103.4 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars1,029 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
